data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: A young Vela Wayfinder Initiate, with a determined yet hopeful expression, stands on the deck of a grand outrigger starship. Clad in Polynesian-inspired attire with nascent tribal patterns, they intently study a glowing, holographic star-chart that projects shimmering cosmic currents, guiding their vessel through the vast nebula-sea. Distant floating volcanic islands and vibrant coral nebulae fill the background, illuminated by twilight starlight.

Artist Credit: inspired by Julie Dillon

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
